entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and after midnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
